title: What do people say about winters in Beijing

content.description:
Radio report

Selection plays one time.
content.question: According to the report, what do many local people say about living in Beijing?

choices.label: The sky is clearer than in the past.
It is always rainy and cloudy in winter.

content.answer: The sky is clearer than in the past.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
